channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2024010079
item.description:
Report X-2024010079

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-18
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING ON THE BROWN BELT INTERNAL CHUTE. ONCE BROUGHT TO THE SERVICE CENTER IT WAS FOUND TO BE A LUGGAGE BAG FILLED WITH ASSORTED AEROSOL CANS. THE RESPONDERS THEN TOOK PICTURES OF THE PACKAGE AND WROTE IT UP AS A SUSPECTED UNDECLAIRED PACKAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023120855
item.description:
Report X-2023120855

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer, and placed on tugger. Package had been loaded on tugger cart sideways resulting in leakage. DescribePack: Cap not secured tightly on bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Tighten cap, remove from area and place in black bin.
